name: 余琬琴　Office Hours
objective: 本課程介紹微生物細胞培養之技術與應用，課程內容涵蓋下列主題：(1) 微生物細胞之結構與特性 (2) 微生物的培養，包括各式生物反應器的介紹 (3) 微生物的代謝 (4) 微生物培養在工業上的應用 (5) 胺基酸與蛋白質 (6) 酵素， 課程內容取材自教科書與期刊文獻
schedule:
1. Course introduction
2. Overview of microorganisms
3. Microbial nutrition and growth
4. Cultivation of microbial cells
5. Introduction to microbial metabolism
6. Synthesis of industrial products by microorganisms
7. Amino acids and proteins
8. Enzymes
9. Journal paper reading and discussion
materials:
參考書
1. "Foundations in microbiology" 10th Ed by Talaro (高立圖書)
2. "Principles of biochemistry" 7th Ed by Nelson and Cox (藝軒圖書)
3. SCI Journal papers
